document_data.name: Dao mazework
document_data.mainbody: '''Dao mazeworks''' were the homes of [[noble dao]] who lived far from the vast [[Sevenfold Mazework]].
document_data.Location: These structures were typically located somewhere on the [[Elemental Plane of Earth]], but could be found on other planes as well. [[Zakhara]] on the [[Prime Material Plane]] housed dao mazeworks.
document_data.Inhabitants: In addition to the leading noble dao, a dao mazework usually held at least 40 [[dao]] accompanied by [[earth elemental]]s, other vassals and slaves, and several [[sandman|sandmen]].
